Query.Sentence: SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM (SELECT veh.MATRICULA AS SRC_ID, veh.DSCR AS SRC_NAME, veh.CIF, rdv.COM_ID, rdv.RDV_UNIT_SN, rdw.RDW_ID, rdw.RDW_ACTIVE, rdw.RDP_ID, rdw.RDW_PERIOD, rdw.RDW_HOUR, rdw.RDW_CREATE_USER, rdw.RDW_CREATE_DATE, rdw.RDW_UPDATE_USER, rdw.RDW_UPDATE_DATE, 'V' AS SRCTYPE, rdp.RDP_NAME FROM RDW_VEH_CFG rdv, RDW_CFG rdw, CDVEHICULOS_EMP veh, RDW_PROVIDER rdp WHERE veh.MATRICULA = rdv.VEH_ID (+) AND veh.CIF = rdv.COM_ID (+) AND rdv.RDV_ID = rdw.RDW_ID (+) AND rdw.RDP_ID = rdp.RDP_ID (+) UNION ALL SELECT drv.IDCONDUCTOR AS SRC_ID, drv.NOMBRE ||' '||drv.APELLIDOS AS SRC_NAME, drv.CIF, rdd.COM_ID, NULL AS UNIT_SN, rdw.RDW_ID, rdw.RDW_ACTIVE, rdw.RDP_ID, rdw.RDW_PERIOD, rdw.RDW_HOUR, rdw.RDW_CREATE_USER, rdw.RDW_CREATE_DATE, rdw.RDW_UPDATE_USER, rdw.RDW_UPDATE_DATE, 'D' AS SRCTYPE, rdp.RDP_NAME FROM RDW_DRV_CFG rdd, RDW_CFG rdw, CDCONDUCTORES_EMP drv, RDW_PROVIDER rdp WHERE drv.IDCONDUCTOR = rdd.DRV_ID (+) AND drv.CIF = rdd.COM_ID (+) AND rdd.RDD_ID = rdw.RDW_ID (+) AND rdw.RDP_ID = rdp.RDP_ID (+) ) vtmp #WHERE# #ORDER#
